WorkItem.Description: When I have all Armor Tokens un-checked, gear pieces requiring them for purchase still show up in the lists (e.g., Obsidian Arborweave Headpiece). In experimenting with un-checking and re-checking filters one at a time, I can see that these gear items are linked to the Valor and Justice Point filters instead. Makes for an unnecessarily cumbersome list when I'm trying to gear up pre-raid!

Comments.Message: I don't see this behavior. I see it linked to the Tier 12 Raid Firelands.

I managed to fix it myself. I Edited the Valor and Justice Points filters to take out the vendors' names. This was what was making the pieces requiring armor tokens show up when points were selected. (Incidentally, I had Tier 12 Raid Firelands un-checked as well as Armor Tokens, and the pieces were still showing up.)

I'm implementing Taliyah's hotfix to the next release. I am currently coming up with a secondary bug where the item level filtering is not working correctly. I'll keep this issue up so to remind myself to get the item level filtering fixed as well.
Most of the odd Item Level filtering issue is documented in Issue 21258
